greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of endofunctions on [n] whose cycle lengths are primes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..386
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember; local r, p;
if n=0 then 1 else r, p:=0, 2;
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = Module[{r, p}, If[n == 0, 1, {r, p} = {0, 2}; While[p <= n, r = r + (p - 1)!*b[n - p]*Binomial[n-1, p-1]; p = NextPrime[p]]; r]];
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 06 2016
